title: Fantastic Beasts 2 Comic-Con Trailer Reacts - The Kinda Funny Morning Show 07.25.18
description:
Thanks to Simple Contacts.. Save $20 on your first Simple Contacts order at http://www.simplecontacts.com/kindafunny20 and use promo code: kindafunny20.

Andy, Nick, Jared, and Cool Greg are HYPED for the new Fantastic Beasts trailer. We also talk about Mission Impossible: Fallout, Jackie Chan, and Andy getting to play Spider-man without Nick.

News and other topics covered:
-Mission: Impossible - fallout budget soars after Tom Cruise Injury, raising box-office stakes (23:30 mins)
-Ballad of buster scruggs is a film and its headed for oscar season (32:28 mins)
-Fantastic Beasts trailer  (37:20 mins)
-Andy went to LA (49:47 mins)
-Fraiser reboot being explored by Kelsey Grammer & CBS TV studios (65:05 mins)

Special thanks to https://www.twitter.com/kumailh for the time stamps!

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.

Music by Tonedeff - http://www.QN5.com
